headline: Healthpeak Properties Declares Monthly Common Stock Cash Dividends for the Second Quarter of 2025
summary: DENVER, April 07, 2025--Healthpeak Properties, Inc. (NYSE: DOC), a leading owner, operator, and developer of real estate for healthcare discovery and delivery, announced that on April 4, 2025, its Board of Directors declared a monthly common stock cash dividend of $0.10167 per share for the second quarter of 2025, payable on the payment dates set forth in the table below to stockholders of record as of the close of business on the corresponding record date in the table below. headline: Healthpeak Properties Announces Leadership Update
summary: DENVER, April 07, 2025--Healthpeak Properties, Inc. (NYSE: DOC) (the "Company"), a leading owner, operator, and developer of real estate for healthcare discovery and delivery, announced that Peter Scott has resigned as the Company’s Chief Financial Officer to assume the role of Chief Executive Officer of Healthcare Realty Trust Incorporated (NYSE: HR).

headline: Mercy, Mercy, Mercy
summary: Trump's tariff strategy could revive US manufacturing or lead to inflation and economic retaliation. Find out high-quality, recession-resistant REIT stocks here.
